model
Class SpaceObject

java.lang.Object
  model.SpaceObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Asteroid, Player, Shot
public abstract class SpaceObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The basic object in the Game, from which all other inherite. It provides basic interaction and movement functionallity and it is provides a printable version/image of itself.

Author:
danielschmidt
See Also:

Gets all borders the Spaceobject touches

Parameters:
resolution - Resolution of the enviroment it is in
Returns:
An boolean ArrayList with length 4. (Top, Right, Bottom, Left) as e.g. margin in CSS
